content.thinking: Let me check the schema of the prs table.

content.text:
CREATE TABLE prs (
	id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
	repo TEXT NOT NULL,
	number INTEGER NOT NULL,
	title TEXT NOT NULL,
	url TEXT NOT NULL,
	role TEXT NOT NULL,
	state TEXT NOT NULL,
	reason TEXT,
	last_updated TEXT NOT NULL,
	last_polled TEXT NOT NULL,
	muted INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	details_fetched INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	details_fetched_at TEXT,
	mergeable INTEGER,
	mergeable_state TEXT,
	ci_status TEXT,
	review_status TEXT
, head_sha TEXT, head_branch TEXT, comment_count INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, approved_by_me INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, heat_state TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'cold', last_heat_activity_at TEXT, author TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', host TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'github.com');
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_prs_host_repo_number ON prs(host, repo, number);

details.aggregated:

, head_sha TEXT, head_branch TEXT, comment_count INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, approved_by_me INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, heat_state TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'cold', last_heat_activity_at TEXT, author TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', host TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'github.com');
